title: Pandemic Pandemonium, Preventing Alzheimer’s, Parenting Pitfalls
description:
Does the constant bombardment of Covid-19 information cause more chaos than calm? Plus, if parenting feels far from blissful, you are not alone. And leading neuroscientist & nutritionist Dr. Lisa Mosconi shares insights from her new book, “The XX Brain: The Groundbreaking Science Empowering Women to Maximize Cognitive Health and Prevent Alzheimer’s Disease.” (recorded 3/9/20)

Guest links:

TheXXBrain.com

LisaMosconi.com

Send us your brief question for Dr. Lisa Mosconi at jillianpodcast@gmail.com


Start your FREE 7 day trial for Jillian’s My Fitness App at https://go.jillianmichaels.com/WNt1rL7uyZ
